ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Whats up with kill stealing????
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe they think they are helping you by taking off some of the mobs so you don t get killed? Man, I remember when I once had some lower lvl follow me around
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe they think they are helping you by taking off some of the mobs so you
don't get killed?
Man, I remember when I once had some lower lvl follow me around and try to
loot everything I killed. He even sat on one of the corpses so I couldn't
loot it. I had to threaten to petition his ass for him to go away.
luv,
-Su

> Hi everyone!
> What is up with the kill stealing? I've had it
> happen to me several times where I was soloing and
> after killing several creatures, (Getting attacked one
> right after another), I'll find that while I'm
> fighting off an attacker my other kills have been
> stolen. Sometimes I'll even see them do it. Granted
> I've gone up to some other players kills after a time
> mistaking it for one of mine but I mean blatently
> going up and stealing a kill right in front of the
> original player?
>
> That really sucks!
> C-ya!
> Steve
> (A.K.A Durgaa, Shizney, Printor, Ahlannah)
>
>
